spec_data.Name: perl-Tk-DoubleClick
spec_data.Description:
Tk::DoubleClick module correctly handle single-click vs double-click
events, calling only the appropriate callback for the given event.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:56:35 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Correctly handle single-click vs double-click events
